notes.title: Supporting Information Available
notes.p:
The Supporting Information is available free of charge on the ACS Publications website at DOI: 10.1021/acs.chemmater.9b02013.
DSC of Mn 1.4PtSn; polarized light optical micrograph of Mn 1.4PtSn; single crystal figure of Mn 1.4PtSn; Laue patterns in different crystallographic directions; composition by chemical analysis; magnetization versus temperature at various applied magnetic field; anisotropic displacement parameters; and bond lengths for Mn 1.4PtSn ( PDF)
